lore: Just like standard Vampire Bats, they seem to be attracted to coins, though in their case it is for a good reason. These intelligent creatures are literate, and they often visit the marketplaces of towns and villages to buy food and books. They usually live in abandoned houses near urban areas and earn their living as messengers, although many of them prefer to simply attack travelers and steal their money.
menagerieDialog: (It gently nuzzles you, which is quite discomforting considering it's a Bat.)
(It tries to nip at anyone who gets too close, including you. So moody!)
(Everett claims this creature can read, which cements your opinion that he is extremely weird.)
(It moves just a little too fast for your liking. It's unsettling.)
(It's fiddling with a piece of lint it stole from your pocket earlier.)
name: Mutated Vampire Bat
